 Sure . Here are some tips for job-hunting on the web: 1. Use search engines like Google to find job postings. 2. Check out job boards like Monster and CareerBuilder. 3. Look for company career pages on their websites. 4. Use social media platforms like LinkedIn to network with professionals and find job opportunities. 5. Attend virtual career fairs and webinars. 6. Consider using a recruitment agency. 7. Don't forget to tailor your resume and cover letter to each job application. 8. Follow up with potential employers after submitting your application. 9. Be persistent and keep searching until you find the right job for you. 10. Good luck!

 Sure . The Dragon-Boat Festival is a traditional Chinese festival that is held on the fifth day of the fifth month of the lunar calendar . It is believed to commemorate the death of Qu Yuan , a patriotic poet who drowned himself in the river to protest against the corrupt government of his time .
